title: Bug: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to open a java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, the popup menu to add breakpoints and marks does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
Expected: A menu should pop up to allow adding breakpoints and marks, but it does not.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
Expected: A menu should pop up to allow adding breakpoints and marks.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
